testcase.classname: feature to Create New Customer Account
testcase.name: Successful Create Account with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/".............passed Then Click on Create an Account link........................................passed Then Enter the First Name...................................................passed Then Enter the Last Name....................................................passed Then Fill up the Email id...................................................passed Then Fill up the Password...................................................passed Then Fill up the Confirm Password...........................................passed And Click on Create an Account button.......................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/".............passed Then Click on Sign In link..................................................passed And User enters Email as "pawarpramod6154@gmail.com" and Password as "Pramod@123".passed And Click on SignIn.........................................................passed
